properties.name: action
properties.description: An action which will be shown as a link on the value.
properties.rawdescription: An action which will be shown as a link on the value.

properties.name: key
properties.description: The key to determine the value from an object. You need to provide this object then to the properties-list component as well in the [values] input. Note, you can only either display a value or a key. A key always is preferred over an value.
properties.rawdescription:
The key to determine the value from an object. You need to provide this object then to the
properties-list component as well in the [values] input. Note, you can only either display
a value or a key. A key always is preferred over an value.

properties.name: transform
properties.description: Allows to transform a value if needed.
properties.rawdescription: Allows to transform a value if needed.

properties.name: type
properties.rawdescription: The display type of this item.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value to show for this label.
properties.rawdescription: The value to show for this label.
